name: Death 2 Me
description:
Controls:

Arrow Keys to move 

Up arrow to jump

try to die :)

This project was made for the Godot wild jam #33. 

The theme was "You aren't the hero" 

I tried to do a weird twist were you weren't a hero, mostly because you just go through the whole game trying to die. When there was going to be a couple other things you could be worrying about instead.

I tried to push myself a bit by adding some dialogue and basic cutscenes. I planned for 5 levels but I only got three done with no music or sounds. I'm gonna finish this project after the jam. 

Credits

Me... I'm to blame..... sorry
